title: Sheriff Mark Lamb's appearance on QAnon-Promoting Outlet "X22 Report."

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arizona Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

For the period 6/1/20-1/27/23, any email, instant message, or other written communication (including any attached files) either to or from Sheriff Lamb; his personal or executive assistant(s); or any staff member/contractor responsible for arranging the sheriff's public appearances that contains one or more of the following non-case-sensitive phrases:

X22, X-22, X 22, x22report.com, QAnon, Q Anon, Q-Anon, anons, anon, podcast, Rumble, child trafficking, Satan, Satanism, border.

If records are not retained for part of this period, please search as far back as record retention allows.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Al Jones
